document.query: ALTER TABLE `audit` ADD `audit_id` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `created_type`;
ALTER TABLE `client_audit` ADD `audit_id` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `created_type`;
ALTER TABLE `client_detail_audit` ADD `audit_id` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `created_type`;
ALTER TABLE `sale_order_audit` ADD `audit_id` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `created_type`;
ALTER TABLE `sale_order_detail_audit` ADD `audit_id` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `created_type`;
